bibdata.title: IEEE Approved Draft High Speed Test Access Port and On-chip Distribution Architecture
IEEE Approved Draft High Speed Test Access Port and On-chip Distribution Architecture

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Circuitry that may be built into an integrated circuit to assist in the test, maintenance and support of assembled printed circuit boards, assembled multi-die packages and the test of die internal circuits is defined. The circuitry includes a high-speed TAP (HSTAP) with a packet encoder/decoder and distribution architecture through which instructions and test data are communicated. The standard leverages the languages of IEEE Std. 1149.1 in order to describe and operate the on-chip circuits.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
